caption.p: Changes of correlations between ring-width indices and some monthly climate variables along altitudinal gradient. ( a) Temperature of the current June (c6T). ( b) Precipitation of the current June (c6P). ( c) Temperature of the previous July (p7T). ( d) Precipitation of the previous July (p7P). Black dotes denote RWI-climate correlations with p values < 0.05; grey dots, p < 0.1; Circles, p > = 0.1.
